item.description: Jewish? Single? 45-65? Please join us for another great event hosted by Ken Bresler! Enjoy beautiful music, a lovely venue, delectable deserts, champagne, & a friendly and gender-balanced group of congenial singles. THE BOSTON JEWISH MUSIC FESTIVAL has kindly set aside a section for singles at Basya Schechter’s concert, “Songs of Wonder.” Following the concert, Congregation Kehillath Israel, the concert site, has reserved a beautiful space for a singles’ dessert and champagne reception. As THIS WILL BE A GENDER-BALANCED EVENING, preregistration AT THE WEBSITE BELOW is absolutely required. IMPORTANT: REGISTRATION here at meetup DOES NOT HOLD YOUR SPOT. For full details and to register, please go to: www.bresler.us. When registering, please mention that ***ELANA SENT YOU**** :) Hope to see you there! In setting the Yiddish poetry of the revered Jewish philosopher and civil rights activist, Rabbi Abraham Joshua Heschel, to music, Basya Schechter has created a rich new collection of Yiddish songs with a contemporary touch. This exciting project blends Basya’s lovely voice, Heschel’s powerful poetry, and some of the finest musicians in the NYC Downtown Jewish Scene. What better place to hear this music than in the synagogue where Heschel often spoke!
item.name: Concert & Desert/Champagne Reception
